channel.title: Anyone know rs's melee xp?
channel.description:
I recently added xp counter with xp drops, and i was getting 50k+ xp drops with my rates lololol :]
so i was wondering does anyone know runescapes rates so xp drops are more realistic?
[code]public static final int MELEE_EXP_RATE = 935; // damage * exp rate public static final int RANGE_EXP_RATE = 960; public static final int MAGIC_EXP_RATE = 920; public static final double SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 3;[/code] Thats mine^

item.title: Anyone know rs's melee xp?
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Yeah it’s 4, but for hitpoints xp it’s 2.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone know rs's melee xp?

No its a pking server no training its ::setlevel so you can be whatever you want, just want the pking experience to be legit, so xp counter has to be on point, thank you graven.
